text:
This convenient store used to be K S Kumar & Co. Kumar (Ah Bu) had owned the business for many decades. He & his family used to live on the 2nd floor 3-rooms flat above the shop which is directly connected by a staircase inside the units.
This new minimart has the same layout, wide variety of groceries & daily essentials. Opening hours are earlier at 7 am & later till 11 pm.
Grosary, vegetables,dairy & fruits available. Person knows multiple languages.  They will supply  free home delivery with no minimum order amount.
